SELECT A.ID , A.LOCATION , A.COMPANY_DATA FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS RNUM , B.ID , B.CATEGORY AS LOCATION , B.MATZIP_DATA AS COMPANY_DATA FROM MATZIP_BOARD AS B , (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) R WHERE CATEGORY=#{location} AND CLOSED_STATE = 'N' ) AS A LIMIT #{startRow}, #{dataPerPage}
